com.bmc.arsys.apitransport.connection

Class ApiDefaultProxyAbstractManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bmc.arsys.apitransport.connection.ApiProxyManager
      • com.bmc.arsys.apitransport.connection.ApiDefaultProxyAbstractManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApiProxyManagerI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultProxyManager

    public abstract class ApiDefaultProxyAbstractManager
extends ApiProxyManager
    This is a internal class. To hide several method from public DefaultProxyManager and javadoc This method overrides methods which do not support in DefaultProxyManager.
